data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Yala, Thailand. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yala, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Yala, Thailand humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Yala, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 524,200 people living in Yala, Thailand. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, 0.4% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Yala who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Yala, Thailand.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Yala.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
